title: Is investing in the Alibaba Group a good idea? I'm am not from China, but from what I've read they are huge, well diversified, and continuously moving into new markets. It seems like they may be the “Amazon” of China. - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely. Alibaba Group is more than the “Amazon of China”. It’s a powerhouse not just in e-commerce, but in almost everything related to technology in China. My team and I wrote a deep research report why Alibaba Group (and other 5 Chinese tech companies) is definitely an amazing investment for the long term. To give you just a perspective of the dominance of Alibaba in China, I will put some statistics here, taken from the last Q3 2017 Financial Report and from Double 11 Event: Alibaba Group Holding Limited (NYSE: BABA) announced that US$25.3 billion (RMB168.2 billion) of gross merchandise volume (GMV) was settled through Alipay on November 11, 2017, an increase of 39% compared to 2016. Mobile GMV settled through Alipay accounted for 90% of total GMVRevenue generated in Q3 2017 was RMB55,122 million (US$8,285 million), an increase of 61% year-over-yearMobile MAUs on our China retail marketplaces reached 549 million in September 2017, an increase of 20 million over June 2017Net cash provided by operating activities was RMB30,507 million US$4,585 million) and non-GAAP free cash flow was RMB22,505 million (US$3,383 million)Cloud computing revenue grew 99% year-over-year to RMB2,975 million (US$447 million), driven by both robust growth in paying customers and improving revenue mix to higher valued-added services. We are seeing significant traction and diversification of customers and revenue, and will continue to invest to further expand the market through valuable services for our cloud customers.During the quarter, we successfully executed our strategy of acquiring and developing a mixture of licensed and original content that resulted in greater consumer mind share in both the drama and variety show categories. As a result, daily average subscribers of Youku video subscriptions in creased over 180% year-on-year during the quarter ended September 30, 2017. We believe a strong content pipeline, especially with a focus on original content, offering greater flexibility around availability and distribution, will bring us sustainable long-term advantages in video entertainment.This picture could provide a better understanding of the financial health of the company:  Now, let´s see about the growth of the stock in the last 2 years, compared with Amazon (AMZN) and eBay (EBAY):  And, this is just a quick view of “The Alibaba Economy”. There are more segments and business units inside it which cover travel, logistics, healthcare, retail, gaming, etc; and its amazing strategy about capital allocation has provided to the company an incredible leverage. So, Is Alibaba Group (BABA) a good investment for the long-term? A BIG YES from our research group. BABA is just one of the companies we analyzed in our report, there are 5 more to include to a savvy investing portfolio.
